alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:29PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a half of an inch. * WHERE...Bolivar County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
